summary: Two workmen accidentally launch a space rocket intended for Mars, and find mistakenly landing in New Orleans just the beginning of their misadventures.
cast: Bud Abbott|Lou Costello|Mari Blanchard|Robert Paige|Horace McMahon|Martha Hyer|Jack Kruschen|Joe Kirk|Jean Willes|Anita Ekberg|James Flavin|Jackie Loughery|Ruth Hampton|Valerie Jackson|Renate Hoy|Jeanne Thompson|Jeri Miller|Judy Hatula|Elsa Edsman|Bill Baldwin|Bobby Barber|Stanley Blystone|Milt Bronson|Ralph Brooks|Ken Christy|Juanita Close|Russ Conway|Barry Curtis|Harold DeGarro|Dudley Dickerson|Lester Dorr|Jane Easton|Hal Forrest|Ed Fury|James Gonzalez|Harold Goodwin|Dick Gordon|Tim Graham|Douglas Henderson|Donald Kerr|Mildred Kornman|Harry Lang|Rex Lease|Scott Lee|Grace Lenard|Hank Mann|Frank Marlowe|Saul Martell|Patti McKay|Forbes Murray|William Newell|Paul Newlan|Helen Noyes|Gloria Pall|Gregg Palmer|Syd Saylor|Cora Shannon|Harry Shearer|Jack Shutta|Carl Sklover|Ray Spiker|Robert Stevenson|Helen Strohm|Brick Sullivan|Jack Tesler|Dale Van Sickel|Stanley Waxman|Sally Yarnell|Betty Yeaton
title: Abbott y Costello van a Marte
